Instruction: Slice the baguette into thin rounds and place them on a baking sheet.
Once the baguette rounds are toasted, spread each with a layer of goat cheese.
Bake the crostini in the preheated oven for 3-5 minutes, or until the blueberries are slightly softened.
Remove from the oven and let cool slightly.
Drizzle with honey and sprinkle with fresh thyme leaves.
Serve warm as an elegant side dish or appetizer.
